Comments.Message:
Any particular Writer? or all of them?
Can you provide an actual stack dump, because I've checked those lines in 1.7.7 for both Writer/Excel5/Workbook.php and Writer/Excel2007/Workbook.php and neither contains anything that could throw an exception

Are you actually using PHPExcel or the PEAR Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer package?

It looks like you're including both libraries, but no file Writer/Workbook.php exists in PHPExcel, I suspect that's part of the Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer (though I haven't checked).
